name: Retro Shooter - Blockout
description:
How to play:

MoveWASDCrouchCJumpSpace

___
This project is a blockout which I created among other tasks for my final exam.

Since it should be based on an existing retro shooter, I took the game "Dusk" as a reference and oriented myself to it.

You can find more information in my portfolio: https://www.franziska-richter.net/

The project is based on the "FPS Microgame" from Unity.
